house_listing.house_description: Very low to no down pmt available on this home. Perfect cond.New roof, carpet, vinyl, paint (in & out). Nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Lakefront home w/community pool, tennis. Quiet neighborhood w/ mature trees. Very pleasant atmosphere. Dont miss this oppty. Priced to sell today.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Club House, Colonial Style,Fenced, Pantry, Tennis Court(s), Walk-In Closet(s), Workshop
